columns.label: รหัสพนักงาน
ชื่อ-นามสกุล
วันที่เริ่มคิดอายุกองทุน
พนักงานสะสม
บริษัทสมทบ
รวมทั้งหมด

name: PVD Report
query:
select
    CONVERT(row_number() over(order by ss.employee), char) as idx,
    ss.employee,
    emp.employee_name,
    salary.amount as salary,
    back_salary.amount as back_salary,
    emp.date_of_joining as pvd_start_date,
    pvd_emp.amount as pvd_emp,
    ss.custom_pvd_employee as pvd_emp_percent,
    pvd_com.amount as pvd_com,
    ss.custom_pvd_company as pvd_com_percent,
    coalesce(pvd_emp.amount, 0) + coalesce(pvd_com.amount, 0) as pvd_total,
    ss.posting_date
from `tabSalary Slip` ss
join `tabEmployee` emp on ss.employee = emp.name
-- -------------------------------------------------------------
-- salary = เงินเดือนประจำ
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` salary on salary.parenttype = 'Salary Slip' and salary.parentfield = 'earnings'
and salary.parent = ss.name and salary.salary_component = 'เงินเดือน'
-- back_salary = เงินตกเบิก
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` back_salary on back_salary.parenttype = 'Salary Slip' and back_salary.parentfield = 'earnings'
and back_salary.parent = ss.name and back_salary.salary_component = 'ตกเบิก'
-- pvd_emp = กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` pvd_emp on pvd_emp.parenttype = 'Salary Slip' and pvd_emp.parentfield = 'deductions'
and pvd_emp.parent = ss.name and pvd_emp.salary_component = 'กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ'
-- pvd_com = กองทุนบริษัทสมทบ
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` pvd_com on pvd_com.parenttype = 'Salary Slip' and pvd_com.parentfield = 'earnings'
and pvd_com.parent = ss.name and pvd_com.salary_component = 'กองทุนบริษัทสมทบ'

where ss.docstatus = %(docstatus)s
and ss.start_date = %(from_date)s and end_date = %(to_date)s
and ss.company = %(company)s
and ss.custom_pvd_type = %(pvd_type)s
